member.name: D3D11_MESSAGE_SEVERITY
member.summary: Debug message severity levels for an information queue.

member.name: D3D11_MESSAGE_SEVERITY.D3D11_MESSAGE_SEVERITY_CORRUPTION
member.summary: Defines some type of corruption which has occurred.

summary.para: Defines a message other than corruption, error, warning, or information.
Direct3D 11: This value is not supported until Direct3D 11.1.
